模块 com.example.BubbleBobble

程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.SpecialItem

package com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.SpecialItem
  • 类概要
    类
    说明
    BombItem
    The concrete class for bomb item, the bomb item handles all interactions between the hero and the bomb item The class uses strategy design pattern, specified in SpecialItemStrategy package When hero hit a bomb item, the lives value of hero will be deducted by one.
    Fruit
    The Fruit class handles how the fruit is created and interacts with the hero.
    IceItem
    The concrete class for ice item, the ice item handles all interactions between the hero and the ice item The class uses strategy design pattern, specified in SpecialItemStrategy package When hero hit a ice item, hero's velocity attribute will be altered to a certain extent
    MedicineItem
    The concrete method for medicine item, the medicine item handles all interactions between the hero and the medicine item The class uses strategy design pattern, specified in SpecialItemStrategy package When user hit a medicine item, the lives of the hero will recover by one
    SpecialItem
    The Abstract SpecialItem is the items on the interactable world where hero can collide with, There are three kinds of special items available in the current game: Bomb item: when hero collide with the bomb item, the live of the hero will be deducted Ice item: when hero collide with the ice item, the hero's X and Y velocity will be decreased Medicine item: when hero collide with the medicine item, the hero's lives will be recover by one
    SpecialItemFactory
    Abstract class for special item factory, to create specific special item according to type specified in the CreateCharacter(char type, InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum) method.
